Loose Women has been accused of animal abuse after Coleen Nolan reunited James Cosmo with Tony the Pony. 
The Loose Women panelist and former Game of Thrones star met in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
And the two were reunited with each other - and also the pony, who was part of a task in the Channel 5 house. 
Coleen had pretended she was storming offstage and “off for a fag”, when she heard there was another guest coming on. Read More Coleen came on with Tony the Pony (Photo: ITV) Loose Women viewers accused the show of animal cruelty (Photo: ITV) 
But back on she came with Tony dressed in a floral headband and tinsel. 
James was over the moon to be reunited with his pony pal. 
But Loose Women viewers weren’t impressed with the segment, accusing the show of animal cruelty. 
One said: “Aww poor #TonyThePony paraded round in a ridiculous outfit on #LooseWomen in front of whooping and cheering audience. He looked terrified.” Read More Coleen brought the pony on (Photo: ITV) James was happy (Photo: ITV) 
Another added: “That is absolute animal abuse feel soooo sorry for that wee pony. You should be ashamed #LooseWomen.” 
A third agreed: “That dressed up pony looks so scared! That was not okay @loosewomen.” 
*Loose Women continues on ITV1 weekdays at 12.30pm Like us on Facebook
